name: Mine
description: A deep excavation site, representing hidden wealth, dangerous depths, and the rewards of hard work.

person: A hardworking individual who uncovers hidden value through persistence
Someone who exploits others' labor or takes credit for others' work
creatureTrap: Creatures that burrow or live in underground environments
Cave-ins, gas pockets, or structural collapses in underground areas
place: Rich underground deposits of valuable materials or information
Dangerous underground areas prone to collapse or toxic conditions
treasure: Raw materials, gems, or precious metals of great value
Resources that require dangerous or expensive extraction methods
situation: Opportunities that require hard work but promise great rewards
Situations where pursuing gain leads to dangerous or unstable conditions
